resources.string:
- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 1/2 cups sugar
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1 cup milk
- 3 large eggs
- 3 tbsp matcha powder
- 2 tsp baking powder
- 1/2 tsp salt

- Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
- Cream the butter and sugar until fluffy.
- Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well.
- Stir in milk and matcha powder.
- Combine flour, baking powder, and salt; add to wet mixture.
- Pour into greased pans and bake for 25-30 minutes.

- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 1/2 cups sugar
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1 cup milk
- 3 large eggs
- 1 tbsp vanilla extract
- 2 cups fresh blueberries
- 2 tsp baking powder
- 1/2 tsp salt

- Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
- Cream the butter and sugar until fluffy.
- Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well.
- Stir in milk and vanilla.
- Combine flour, baking powder, and salt; add to wet mixture.
- Gently fold in blueberries and pour into greased pans.
- Bake for 25-30 minutes.

- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 2 cups sugar
- 3/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1 cup milk
- 3 large eggs
- 2 tsp baking powder
- 1 tsp baking soda
- 1/2 tsp salt

- Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
- Cream the butter and sugar until fluffy.
- Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well.
- Stir in milk and cocoa powder.
- Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt; add to wet mixture.
- Pour into greased pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.

- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 1/2 cups sugar
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1 cup milk
- 3 large eggs
- 1/4 cup lemon juice
- 1 tbsp lemon zest
- 2 tsp baking powder
- 1/2 tsp salt

- Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
- Cream the butter and sugar until fluffy.
- Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well.
- Stir in milk, lemon juice, and lemon zest.
- Combine flour, baking powder, and salt; add to wet mixture.
- Pour into greased pans and bake for 25-30 minutes.

- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 1/2 cups sugar
- 1/2 cup unsalted butter
- 1 cup milk
- 3 large eggs
- 1 cup fresh strawberries, pureed
- 2 tsp baking powder
- 1/2 tsp salt

- Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
- Cream the butter and sugar until fluffy.
- Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well.
- Stir in milk and strawberry puree.
- Combine flour, baking powder, and salt; add to wet mixture.
- Pour into greased pans and bake for 25-30 minutes.

Whisk, bake, and blossom—let your kitchen creations bloom with flavor and joy!
